titles.title: Farmer to Consumer Farm Produce Enhancement Act
A bill to amend 23 U.S.C. 131(c).

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Referred to Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

bill.summary: 8/11/1988--Introduced. Farmer to Consumer Farm Produce Enhancement Act - Amends Federal highway law pertaining to outdoor advertising to permit the seasonal or temporary advertising on Interstate and Federal-aid primary highways of locations at which consumers may harvest and purchase agricultural commodities from farmers producing them. Limits the size of advertising displays to 150 square feet.
